meanings.definition: The strip of hair growing on the ridge above the eye socket.
meanings.sent1: Her eyebrows were thick and dark, framing her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She plucked her eyebrows to shape them nicely.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar thought the eyebrows of the chameleon were caterpillars too!
meanings.sent4: His eyebrows were like two fuzzy caterpillars resting on his forehead.
meanings.sent5: The eyebrows of the old man were so long, they almost touched his eyelids.

meanings.definition: The arch or ridge forming the upper part of the orbit of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The eyebrows of the cave entrance were dark and menacing.
meanings.sent2: Her eyebrows furrowed in confusion as she tried to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The eyebrows of the mountain seemed to frown at the approaching storm.
meanings.sent4: The eyebrows of the building gave it a stern and imposing look.
meanings.sent5: The eyebrows of the cliff cast a shadow over the valley below.
